Package ca.hullabaloo.util.cache

Interface Summary
Cache A simple cache interface.
Cache.Entry Defines an entry in the cache.
CacheManager Allows retrieval of a cache by name.
FixedSizeCache Defines caches which implement a fixed maximum capacity.
 

Class Summary
DefaultCacheEntry A default implementation for Cache.Entry.
LRUMemoryCache Least-Recently-Used cache that stores stuff in memory.
SoftCacheEntry Implements a Cache.Entry that holds its data as a soft reference.
